name: Shadow Magic
description: Your innate magic draws from the Shadowfell, blurring the line between life and death.

1.name: Eyes of the Dark
1.description: You have darkvision out to 120 feet and at 3rd level can cast darkness with sorcery points and see through it.

1.name: Strength of the Grave
1.description: When damage would reduce you to 0 hit points, make a Charisma save to drop to 1 hit point instead, once per long rest unless radiant or critical.

6.name: Hound of Ill Omen
6.description: Spend 3 sorcery points to summon a spectral hound that relentlessly pursues a target, imposing disadvantage on its saves against your spells.

14.name: Shadow Walk
14.description: While in dim light or darkness, teleport up to 120 feet to another dim light or dark area as a bonus action.

18.name: Umbral Form
18.description: Spend 6 sorcery points to become shadowy for 1 minute, gaining resistance to all but force and radiant damage and the ability to move through creatures and objects.
